name: Spacescape (itch) (NoahV, Dylan in a box, TimoT3103, Cluunk)
name_original: Spacescape (itch) (NoahV, Dylan in a box, TimoT3103, Cluunk)
description:
Spacescape is a first-person roguelike shooter in which the player is trying to escape a space prison.  Fight through rooms filled with robots, gather loot, beat the boss and escape!

CONTROLS: 

  • Left Mouse Button shoot
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Space to jump
  • E to pick up
